thread.title: Nikki Wilson
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Nikki Wilson

author: Nikki Wilson
title: Nikki Wilson
text:
I used LD mountain centre a lot as a child for my school ski trips when i lived in newcastle and it was a famous and permanent feature in Dean street for as long as i recall. I was recently searching on line to purchase my partner a canada goose jacket and was surprised to see that the cheapest price was from an old favourite, LD mountain centre!
Not only was it the cheapest but it arrived the following day (technically within 15 hours of ordering it).
What more could you want?? Great product from a trusted favourite at a low price with second to none service!
